content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #240

## May 2019 Ballot Comment:

Submitted by @euvitudo
Chapter/section: Event Notification Request Details
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/#event-notification
Type: A-S

Summary:

Comment: The CDS Hooks reference should point to https://cds-hooks.hl7.org

Existing wording: array of named FHIR objects (similar to CDS Hooks's context field)

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

wmaethner commented on Issue #240

During conversation at the Montreal, May 2019 working group meeting with @wdvr, @isaacvetter , @NiklasSvenzen and myself talked through this issue and would like to propose:

Proposed resolution: Persusasive

We will update the link to point to the hl7 cds hooks URL.

NiklasSvenzen labeled Issue #240

wmaethner commented on Issue #240

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

Will Maethner moved the following disposition, seconded by Wouter Devriendt

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described, and use the perma-link (talk to web master about this).

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
